Detailed Description

This is a multi_producer - multi_consumer queue. It can be shared between two or more threads.

int32 uStreamLib::SharedQueue::tryGet (  char *  item,
uint32  size
)  [virtual]
 

Get next item from the queue. This method check for next item in the queue. If an item is not available, ie the queue is empty, then it returns FAILURE.

Parameters:
item pointer to a buffer to store the item into.
size size of the buffer.
Returns:
SUCCESS or FAILURE if the queue is empty.

Reimplemented from uStreamLib::SimpleQueue.

)  [virtual]
 

Put an item in the queue. This method tries to put an item into the queue.

Parameters:
item something to put in the queue (data must be casted to char* here).
size size of the item.
Returns:
SUCCESS or FAILURE if the queue is full.
